name: River City Girls
description: This script applies the Media Foundation Workaround from https://github.com/z0z0z/mf-install accordingly to the proton DB Entry: https://www.protondb.com/app/1049320
notes: Should be used with newer versions of Proton, e.g. Proton 5.0. Go Into Steam, Right Click --> Properties then at the bottom of the Window there is a checkbox with "Force the use of a specific Steam Play compability Tool", select a newer version of steam. This was tested with Proton 5.0. I encountered crashes with the older proton 3.16
content:
game:
  appid: 1049320
installer:
- execute:
    command: TEMP=$DISPLAY && unset DISPLAY &&  winecfg && DISPLAY=$TEMP
    description: Create Wineprefix
    env:
      WINE: $HOME/.local/share/Steam/steamapps/common/Proton 3.7/dist/bin/wine
      WINEPREFIX: $HOME/.local/share/Steam/steamapps/compatdata/1049320/pfx/
- execute:
    command: cd "$GAMEDIR" && git clone "https://github.com/z0z0z/mf-install.git"
      && echo "$GAMEDIR"
    description: Download patch
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/mf-install/mf-install.sh
- execute:
    description: Install patch
    env:
      WINEPREFIX: $HOME/.local/share/Steam/steamapps/compatdata/1049320/pfx/
    file: $GAMEDIR/mf-install/mf-install.sh
require-binaries: git
